trans-unit.source: Represents the kind of event that has occurred on a view of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Representa o tipo de evento que ocorreu em uma exibição de um controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A ViewEvent object is provided to the designer component by the design host, for example [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], when raising an event caused by certain user actions on the design-time view of a control.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto Exibevento é fornecido para o componente de designer pelo host de design, por exemplo [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], ao gerar um evento gerado pela determinadas ações do usuário na exibição de um controle de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>evento é manipulado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegar método, que usa uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objeto como um parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> class is a ViewEvent object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>classe é um objeto Exibevento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static ViewEvent fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegar método compara o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>propriedade para os campos estáticos de Exibevento para determinar qual tipo de ação gerou o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised under the following circumstances: - You click a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um evento é gerado nas seguintes circunstâncias:-você clicar em uma região na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: - The designer draws a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -O designer desenha um controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: - You enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: -Você entrar ou sair de modo para um controle de edição de modelo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe fornece um delegado de padrão para manipular o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle personalizado substituem o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>métodos para processar os eventos para o controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o host de designer uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>de objeto para o tipo de ação na superfície de design e, em seguida, passa o objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objeto indica que tipo de ação:: um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>propriedade fornece os argumentos de evento que são específicos para o tipo de ação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for a click on a designer region.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um evento de exibição foi gerado por um clique em uma região de designer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegar método compara o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>campos para determinar qual tipo de ação gerou o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Click to indicate that you clicked a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>objeto é igual ao clique para indicar que você clicou em uma região na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe fornece um padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Click, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de evento for clique, o delegado chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Derivando de classes de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>método para lidar com eventos em uma região de clique em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate which designer region was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento indicam a região de designer que foi clicado, se houver.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for drawing a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um evento de exibição foi gerado para desenhar um controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegar método compara o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>campos para determinar qual tipo de ação gerou o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Paint to indicate a paint event on the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>objeto é igual de pintura para indicar um evento de pintura no controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe fornece um padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Paint, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de evento for Paint, chama o representante a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Derivando de classes de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>método para lidar com eventos em uma região de clique em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for changing the template mode of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um evento de exibição foi gerado para alterar o modo de modelo de um controle de designer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegar método compara o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>campos para determinar qual tipo de ação gerou o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to TemplateModeChanged to indicate that the template editing mode changed for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>objeto é igual a TemplateModeChanged para indicar que o modelo de modo de edição é alterado para um controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe fornece um padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>delegar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is TemplateModeChanged, the delegate sets the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de evento for TemplateModeChanged, o representante define o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designers personalizados que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>classe pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>método para executar processamento adicional quando as alterações para um controle na superfície de design do modo de edição de modelo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
